title.en: Find the book that fits you!

text.en: A selection of more than a hundred works, find the one that will strike a chord with your soul. And come back for ten more. Search by title, author or series then download all the books of an author or series if you wish!

quote_text.en: Maybe it's not quite legal but it's cool!

text.en: Detailed guides are there to explain how to best manage your eReader but also to get to know the eBooks better in order to modify them if you wish.

quote_text.en: The world of eReaders is so vast!

text.en: Features offer a lot of extra options to find and read eBooks. You can download directly eBooks from your eReader with Catalog or you can use OPDS (Open Publication Distribution System) feed to get all eBooks on your favorite application. And if you want to read eBook directly in your browser with Webreader.

quote_text.en: I am only interested in OPDS feeds adapted to my eReader with Koreader OS.
